title: Alaso USA
body: Developing and testing full stack applications and systems to automate and optimize warehouse operations ranging from utilities as printing labels to measuring production output per machine and warehouse employee.
body2: Developed and maintained {C#}/{.Net 4.7} and {Windows Forms} applications to automate, optimize and track warehouse operations.
Developed and maintained a web ({HTML}/{CSS}/{JavaScript}) dashboard powered by a {C#}/{.Net Core 2} server with {GraphQL}, and using {React}, {webpack}, and {Sass} on the frontend.

title: FCFMN
body: Built a full stack web application to track construction sites for the construction contractors of the FCFMN organization.
Building spreadsheet data management UI component to do bulk editing.
body2: Built, managed, and added features to a full stack web application using a {MEAN} ({MongoDB}, {ExpressJS}, {Angular 2+}, and {Node.js}) architecture to track construction site for the contruction contractors working with the FCFMN organization.

title: TheLeadLion
body: Aided in the development of a lead engine using Node.js on AWS using Lambda functions, SQS, SNS and EC2 instances to process and control the flow of leads.
body2: Aided in the development of a lead engine using {Node.js} on {AWS} using {Lambda} functions, {SQS}, {SNS} and {EC2} instances to process and control the flow of leads.

title: Studio Birdsall LLC
body: Managed and developed fully custom dynamic web solutions and applications for eCommerce and corporate clients on Wordpress, Magento, and Shopify.
Built site crawler that takes full screen snapshots of each page and stores diffs of new and old snapshots to identify changes site wide.
body2: Managed and developed fully custom dynamic web solutions and applications for eCommerce and corporate clients on {Wordpress}, {Magento}, and {Shopify}.
Built site crawler using {Node.js} that takes full screen snapshots of each page and stores diffs of new and old snapshots to identify changes site wide.

title: MyMailbox GPG2 Inc.
body: Designed and developed all of the software for a physical smart mailbox notification system that works with Particleâ€™s IOT micro-controller cloud systems, delivering notifications through Twilio with Node.js.
Developed Alexa Application that reports information from the MyMailbox servers using Node.js and the Alexa Skills Kit.
body2: Developed and maintained physical smart mailbox software using {Particle}'s cloud connected IoT micro-controller powered by {C++} like language.
Developed and maintained full stack web server that connected to the physical smart mailbox using a {Node.js}, {EJS}, {PostgreSQL}, {Heroku}, {Twilio} architecture with a {Vanilla} frontend.
Developed an {Alexa} based {AWS} {Lambda} function that connects to the physical smart mailbox through the full stack server to check for physical mail and other information.

title: BrandCo Employment
body: Built a full stack Email Tracking System called Cue supported on Chrome, Firefox, Outlook and iOS with a small development team that reported directly to employer. For more information see cue.io.
Developed a Client Review System that monitored and distributed client satisfaction per client-employee interaction.
body2: Built a full stack Email Tracking System called Cue on a small team composed of:
A {Chrome Extension} and {FireFox Extension} supporting the following email providers: Gmail, MSN, Office365, TopProducer, Aol and Yahoo; using {HTML}, {CSS}, and {JavaScript}.
Developed a Client-Employee Review System that monitored and distributed client satisfaction per client-employee interaction using {WordPress}, {MySQL}, and {PHP}.
Developed and maintained 100+ cookie cutter websites using {HTML}, {SCSS}/{CSS}, and {JavaScript}; supporting modern and legacy browsers at the time including {Legacy Internet Explorer} (IE7-IE11).
